content: this cute little hot dog measures about 3 inches in length and 1 1/2 inches tall you will need size d hook 3 25mm light brown yarn soft white yarn burgundy yarn stuffing cat nip optional yarn needle red or yellow yarn optional for sauce stitches and abbreviations used… chain - chain sl - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet st - stitch sts - stitches repeat - repeat increase - increase 2 single_crochet in the same space decrease - decrease or decrease single_crochet 2 together
